title: Claiming Myself
description: Sometimes you just have to take the plunge.Being a single mom isn’t in Vicky’s plans, but protecting her child comes first.Running away from an abusive relationship amidst an archaic wolf community is her best option if she wants to offer a better future to her baby girl.While escaping, her life turns 180 degrees the moment she meets Alex—her new pack Alpha.She could have never imagined that someone like him exists. Not only that, but he also seems as fascinated by her as she is by him.Yet, the peace doesn’t last long because her ex doesn’t easily give up, and he’s obsessively looking for her.With her life and her baby’s life on the line, can she settle down in Alex’s community or will she have to give up everything she achieved and run away again?
author: Mary Knaip
